name: Anvil of Hephaestus
printed_effect:
The Empowered Elestral gets +1 {attack}.
When an Artifact Rune on your field is sent
to the Underworld you can Enchant each Spirit
that was Enchanting that Artifact Rune from
your Underworld to a card on your field.
